title: The Eric Andre Show
brief_description: A comedic talk show from an alternate reality featuring unstable hosts, a variety of celebrities—both real and fake—and unusual studio action.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

description: A comedic talk show from an alternate reality featuring unstable hosts, a variety of celebrities—both real and fake—and unusual studio action.
